org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.actions

Class MapillaryImportAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.openstreetmap.josm.actions.JosmAction
        • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.actions.MapillaryImportAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action, org.openstreetmap.josm.tools.Destroyable

    public class MapillaryImportAction
extends org.openstreetmap.josm.actions.JosmAction
    Imports a set of picture files into JOSM. They must be in jpg or png format.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

      • readJPG

        public MapillaryImportedImage readJPG(java.io.File file)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException
        Reads a JPG pictures that contains the needed GPS information (position and direction) and creates a new icon in that position.
        Parameters:
        file - The file where the picture is located.
        Returns:
        The imported image.
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.imaging.ImageReadException - If the file isn't an image.
        java.io.IOException - If the file doesn't have the valid metadata.

      • readNoTags

        public MapillaryImportedImage readNoTags(java.io.File file)
        Reads a image file that doesn't contain the needed GPS information. And creates a new icon in the middle of the map.
        Parameters:
        file - The file where the image is located.
        Returns:
        The imported image.

      • readNoTags

        public MapillaryImportedImage readNoTags(java.io.File file,
                                         org.openstreetmap.josm.data.coor.LatLon pos)
        Reads a image file that doesn't contain the needed GPS information. And creates a new icon in the middle of the map.
        Parameters:
        file - The file where the image is located.
        pos - A LatLon object indicating the position in the map where the image must be set.
        Returns:
        The imported image.

      • readPNG

        public MapillaryImportedImage readPNG(java.io.File file)
        Reads an image in PNG format.
        Parameters:
        file - The file where the image is located.
        Returns:
        The imported image.
